Translations.Text: hazrath Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke Allah ke bheje hoye (farishto) tumhaara kya maqsadh hai
unhone jawaab diya ke hum gunehgaar khaum ki taraf bheje gaye hai
ta ke hum un par mitthi ke kankar barsaaye
jo tere rab ki taraf se nishaan zada hai, un hadh se guzar jaane waalo ke liye
pas jitne imaan waale wahaa thein, hum ne unhe nikaal liya
aur hum ne wahaa musalmaano ka sirf ek hee ghar paaya
aur wahaa hum ne un ke liye jo dardnaak azaab ka dar rakhte hai ek (kaamil) alaamath chohdi
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ke qisse mein (bhi hamaari taraf se tambi hai) ke hum ne ose feraun ki taraf kholi daleel de kar bheja
pas us ne apne bal bothe par mu moda aur kehne laga ye jaadugar hai ya deewana hai
bil aaqir hum ne ose aur us ke lashkaro ko apne azaab mein pakad kar darya mein daal diya, wo tha hee malaamath ke qaabil
isi tarah aadiyo me bhi (hamaari taraf se tambi hai) jab ke hum ne un par khair wa barkath se khaali aandhi bheji
wo jis jis cheez par girti thi, ose bosidha haddi ki tarah (chora chora) kar deti thi
aur samoodh (ke qisse) mein bhi (ibrath) hai jab un se kaha gaya ke tum kuch dino tak fayeda utha lo
lekin unhone apne rab ke hukm se sartaabi ki, jis par un ke dekhte dekhte (tez wa tundh) kadaake ne halaak kar diya
pas na to wo khade ho sa ke aur na badhla le sa ke
aur Nuh(alaihissalaam) ki khaum ka bhi is se pehle (yahi haal ho chuka tha), wo bhi bade na farmaan log thein
asmaan ko hum ne (apne) haatho se banaya hai aur yaqinan hum kushaadgi karne waale hai
aur zameen ko hum ne farsh bana diya hai, pas hum bahuth hee acche bichaane waale hai
aur har cheez ko hum ne joda joda payda kiya hai, ta ke tum nasihath haasil karo
pas tum Allah ki taraf daud bhaag (yaani rujo) karo, yaqinan main tumhe us ki taraf se saaf saaf tambi karne waala hoon
aur Allah ke saath kisi aur ko maboodh na tehraao, beshak main tumhe us ki taraf se khula daraane waala hoon
isi tarah jo log un se pehle guzre hai, un ke paas jo bhi rasool aya, unhone keh diya ke ya to ye jaadugar hai ya deewana hai
kya ye is baath ki ek dosre ko wasiyath karte gaye hai
(nahi) balke ye sab ke sab sarkash hai, to aap un se mu pher le,aap par koyi malaamath nahi
aur nasihath karte rahe, yaqinan ye nasihath imaan waalo ko nafa degi
main ne jinnaath aur insaano ko mahez isi liye payda kiya hai ke wo sirf meri ibaadath kare
na main un se rozi chahta hoon, na meri ye chaahath hai ke ye mujhe khilaaye
Allah ta’ala to khud hee sab ka rozi rasa, tawanaayi waala aur zoor aawar hai
pas jin logo ne zulm kiya hai, unhe bhi un ke saathiyo ke hisse ke misl, hissa milega, lehaza wo mujh se jaldi talab na kare
pas qaraabi hai munkiro ko un ke us din ki jis ka waada diye jaate hai
qasam hai toor ki
aur likhi hoyi kitaab ki
jo jhilli ke khule hoye warq mein hai
aur abaadh ghar ki
aur oonchi chath ki
aur bhad kaaye hoye samandar ki
beshak aap ke rab ka azaab ho kar rehne wala hai
ose koyi rokne waala nahi
jis din asmaan thar thraane lagega
aur pahaad chalne phirne lagenge
us din jhutlaane waalo ki (puri) qaraabi hai
jo apni be huda goyi mein uchal koodh kar rahe hai
jis din wo dhakke de de kar aatishe jahannam ki taraf laaye jayenge
yahi wo aatish dozakh hai jise tum jhoot batlaate thein
(ab bataao) kya ye jaadu hai? ya tum dekhte hee nahi ho
jaao dozakh mein ab tumhaara sabr karna aur na karna tumhaare liye yeksa hai, tumhe faqth tumhaare kiye ka badhla diya jayega
yaqinan parhezgaar log jannato mein aur nemato mein hai
jo unhe un ke rab ne de rakhi hai, us par khush khush hai aur un ke parvardigaar ne unhe jahannam ke azaab se bhi bacha liya hai
tum ma ze se khaate peete raho un amaal ke badhle jo tum karte thein
baraabar biche hoye shaandaar taqte par takye lagaaye hoye, aur hum ne un ke nikaah badi badi aankho waali (huro) se kar diye hai
aur jo log imaan laaye aur un ki aulaad ne bhi imaan mein un ki pairvi ki, hum un ki aulaad ko un tak pahonchaa denge aur un ke amal se hum kuch kam na karenge, har shaqs apne apne amaal ka girvi hai
hum un ke liye mewe aur marghoob gosht ki rel pel kar denge
(khush tabyi ke saath) ek dosre ke saath jaam (sharaab) ki china jhapti karenge, jis sharaab ke suroor mein be huda goyi hogi na gunah
aur un ke ird girdh un ke nau umr ghulaam chal phir rahe honge, goya ke wo moti thein, jo dhake rakhe thein
aur aapas mein ek dosre ki taraf mutawajjeh ho kar sawaal karenge
kahenge ke is se pehle hum ne apne ghar waalo ke darmiyaan bahuth dara karte thein
pas Allah ta’ala ne hum par bada ehsaan kiya aur hamein tez wa tundh garam hawaao ke azaab se bacha liya
hum us se pehle hee us ki ibaadath kiya karte thein, beshak wo mohsin aur meherbaan hai
to aap samjhaate rahe, kyo ke aap apne rab ke fazl se na to kaahin hai, na deewane
kya kaafir yo kehte hai ke, ye shaayar hai, hum is par zamaane ke hawaadis (yani mauth) ka intezaar kar rahe hai
keh dijiye! tum muntazir raho, main bhi tumhaare saath intezaar karne waalo mein hoon
kya un ki aqle unhe yahi sikhaati hai? ya ye log hee sarkash hai
kya ye kehte hai ke is Nabi ne (Qur’aan) khud ghad liya hai, waaqeya ye hai ke wo imaan nahi laate
accha agar ye sacche hai to bhala is jaisi ek (hee) baath ye (bhi) to le aaye
kya ye baghair kisi (paida karne waale) ke khud ba khud paida ho gaye hai, ya ye khud paida karne waale hai
kya un hone hee asmaano aur zameen ko paida kiya hai? balke ye yaqeen na karne waale log hai
ya kya un ke paas tere rab ke khazaane hai? ya (un khazaano ke) ye daarogha hai
ya kya un ke paas koyi sidi hai jis par chad kar sunte hai? (agar aisa hai) to un ka sunne waala koyi roushan daleel pesh kare
kya Allah ki to sab ladkiya hai aur tumhaare haan ladke hai
kya tu un se koyi ujrath talab karta hai ke ye is ke tawaan1 se bhujal ho rahe hai
kya un ke paas ilm e ghayb hai jise ye likh lete hai
kya ye log koyi fareb karna chahte hai? to yaqeen karle ke fareb khurda kaafir hee hai
kya Allah ke siva un ka koyi maboodh hai? (har giz nahi) Allah ta’ala un ke shirk se paak hai
agar ye log asmaan ke kisi tukde ko girta hoa dekh le, tabh bhi kehde ke ye tay ba tay baadal hai
tu unhe chohd de, yahaa tak ke unhe us din se saabeqa pade, jis mein ye be hoosh kar diye jayenge
jis din unhe un ka makr kuch kaam na dega aur na wo madad kiye jayenge
beshak zaalimo ke liye is ke alaawa aur azaab bhi hai, lekin un logo mein se aksar be ilm hai
to apne rab ke hukm ke intezaar mein sabr se kaam le, beshak tu hamaari aankho ke saamne hai, subah ko jab tu uthe, apne rab ki paaki aur hamdh bayaan kar
aur raath ko bhi us ki tasbih pad aur sitaaro ke doobte waqth bhi
qasam hai sitaare ki jab wo gire
ke tumhaare saathi ne, na raah gom ki hai, na wo tedi raah par hai
aur na wo apni qaahish se koyi baath kehte hai
wo to sirf wahi hai, jo utaari jaati hai
ose puri taaqath waale farishte ne sikhaaya hai
jo zoor aawar hai, phir wo sidha khada ho gaya
aur wo bulandh asmaan ke kinaaro par tha
phir nazdeek hoa aur utar ayaa
pas wo do kamaano ke ba-qadr faasla reh gaya balke us se bhi kam
pas us ne Allah ke bandhe ko wahi pahonchaayi, jo bhi pahonchaayi
dil ne jhoot nahi kaha, jise (payghambar ne dekha)
kya tum jhagda karte ho, us par jo (payghambar) dekhte hai
ose to ek martaba aur bhi dekha tha
sidratul muntaha ke paas
osi ke paas jannatul maawa hai
jab ke sidrah ko chupaaye leti thi, wo cheez jo us par chaa rahi thi
na to nigaah behki na hadh se badi
yaqinan us ne apne rab ki badi badi nishaaniyo mein se baaz nishaaniya dekh li
kya tum ne laath aur uzza ko dekha
aur manaath tisre pichle ko
kya tumhaare liye ladke aur Allah ke liye ladkiya hai
ye to badi be insaafi ki taqseem hai

dar asal ye sirf naam hai, jo tum ne aur tumhaare baap dadaao ne, un ke rakh liye hai, Allah ne un ki koyi daleel nahi utaari, ye log to sirf atkal ke aur apni nafsaani qaahisho ke piche pade hoye hai aur yaqinan un ke rab ki taraf se un ke paas hidaayath aa chuki hai
kya har shaqs jo aarzo kare ose mayassar hai
Allah hee ke haath hai ye jahaan aur wo jahaan
aur bahuth se farishte asmaano mein hai, jin ki sifaarish kuch bhi nafa nahi de sakti magar ye aur baath hai ke Allah ta’ala apni khushi aur apni chaahath se jis ke liye chaahe ijaazath de de
beshak jo log aaqirath par imaan nahi rakhte, wo farishto ka zanaana naam muqarrar karte hai
halaan ke unhe us ka koyi ilm nahi, wo sirf apne gumaan ke piche pade hoye hai aur beshak wehem (wa gumaan) haq ke muqaable mein kuch kaam nahi deta
to aap us se mu mod le, jo hamaari yaad se mu mode, aur jin ka iraada bajuz zindagaaniye dunya ke aur kuch na ho
yahi un ke ilm ki inteha hai, aap ka rab us se qoob waaqif hai jo us ki raah se bhatak gaya hai aur wahi qoob waafiq hai us se bhi jo raahe yaafta hai

aur Allah hee ka hai jo kuch asmaano mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai, ta ke Allah ta’ala bure amal karne waalo ko un ke amaal ka badhla de aur nek kaam karne waalo ko accha badhla inaayath farmaaye

un logo ko jo bade gunaaho se bachte hai aur be hayaayi se bhi, sivaaye kisi chote se gunaah ke, beshak tera rab bahuth kushaada maghfirath waala hai, wo tumhe ba qoobi jaanta hai, jab ke us ne tumhe zameen se payda kiya aur jab ke tum apni maao ke pet mein bacche thein, pas tum apni paakizgi aap bayaan na karo, wahi parhezgaaro ko qoob jaanta hai
kya aap ne ose dekha jis ne mu mod liya
aur bahuth kam diya aur haath rok liya
kya ose ilm e ghayb hai ke wo (sab kuch) dekh raha hai
kya ose us cheez ki qabar nahi di gayi jo Mosa (alaihissalaam) ke
aur wafadaar Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ke sahifo mein tha
ke koyi shaqs kisi dosre ka boojh na uthaayega
aur ye ke har insaan ke liye sirf wahi hai jis ki koshish khud us ne ki
aur ye ke beshak us ki koshish an qareeb dekhi jayegi
phir ose pura pura badhla diya jayega
aur ye ke aap ke rab hee ki taraf pahonchna hai
aur ye ke wahi hasaata hai aur wahi rulaata hai
aur ye ke wahi maarta hai aur jilaata hai
aur ye ke osi ne joda yaani nar wa maada payda kiya hai
nutfe se jab ke wo tapkaaya jaata hai
aur ye ke osi ke zimme dobaara payda karna hai
aur ye ke wahi maaldaar banaata hai aur sarmaaya deta hai
aur ye ke wahi shira (sitaare) ka rab hai
aur ye ke osi ne aadh awwal ko halaak kiya hai
aur samoodh ko bhi (jin mein se) ek ko bhi baaqi na rakha
aur us se pehle khaum nuh ko, yaqinan wo bade zaalim aur sarkash thein
aur mu-taafiqa (shahar ya ulti hoyi bastiyo ko) osi ne ulat diya
phir us par cha diya jo chaya
pas aye insaan tu apne rab ki kis kis nemath ke baare mein jhagdega
ye (Nabi) daraane waale hai, pehle daraane waalo mein se
aane waali ghadi qareeb aa gayi hai
Allah ke siva us ka (waqte mu’ayyan par khol) dikhaane waala aur koyi nahi
pas kya tum us baath se ta’ajjub karte ho
aur has rahe ho? rote nahi
(balke) tum khel rahe ho
ab Allah ke saamne sajde karo aur (osi ki) ibaadath karo
qayaamath qareeb aa gayi aur chaandh phat gaya
ye agar koyi maujiza dekhte hai, to mu pher lete hai aur keh dete hai ke ye pehle se chala ataa hoa jaadu hai
unhone jhutlaaya aur apni qaahisho ki pairvi ki aur har kaam tehre hoye waqt par muqarrar hai
yaqinan in ke paas wo qabre aa chuki hai jin mein daant dapat (ki nasihath) hai
aur kaamil aqal ki baath hai, lekin un darauni baatho ne bhi kuch fayda na diya
pas (aye Nabi) tum un se eraaz karo, jis din ek pukaarne waala na gawaar cheez ki taraf pukarega
ye jhuki aankho, qabro se is tarah nikal khade honge, ke goya wo phayla hoa taddi dil hai
pukaarne waale ki taraf daudte honge aur kaafir kahenge, ye din to bahuth saqth hai
un se pehle khaum nuh ne bhi hamaare bandhe ko jhutlaaya tha aur deewana batla kar jhidak diya gaya tha
pas us ne apne rab se dua ki, ke main be bas hoon, tu meri madad kar
pas hum ne asmaan ke darwaazo ko zor ke meh se khol diya
aur zameen se chashmo ko jaari kar diya, pas us kaam ke liye jo muqaddar kiya gaya tha, (duno) paani jama ho gaye
aur hum ne ise taqto aur keelo waali (kashti) par sawaar kar liya
jo hamaari aankho ke saamne chal rahi thi, badhla us ki taraf se jis ka kufr kiya gaya tha

bataao mera azaab aur meri daraane waali batein kaisi rahi
aur beshak hum ne Qur’aan ko samajhne ke liye asaan kar diya hai, pas kya koyi nasihath haasil karne waala hai
khaume aadh ne bhi jhutlaaya, pas kaisa hoa mera azaab aur meri daraane waali batein
hum ne un par tez wa tundh musal sil chalne waali hawa, ek paiham man’hoos din mein bhej di
jo logo ko utha utha kar de patakti thi, goya ke wo jad se kate hoye khajoor ke ta’ne hai
pas kaisi rahi meri saza aur mere daraana

beshak hum ne un par patthar barsaane waali hawa bheji, siwaaye Looth(alaihissalaam) ke ghar waalo ke, unhe hum ne saher ke waqt najaath de di

(gori rangath ki) hore jannati khimo mein rehne waaliya hai
pas (aye insaano aur jino) tum apne rab ki kis kis nemath ko jhutlaoge
un ko haath nahi lagaaya kisi insaan ya jin ne, is se qabl
pas apne parvardigaar ki kaun kaun si nemath ke saath tum takzeeb karte ho
sabz masnado aur umdah farsho par takya lagaaye hoye honge
pas (aye jino aur insaano!) tum apne rab ki kis kis nemath ko jhutlaoge
tere parvardigaar ka naam ba barkath hai jo izzath wa jalaal waala hai
jab qayaamath qaayam ho jayegi
jis ke waaqe hone mein koyi jhoot nahi
wo pasth karne waali aur bulandh karne waali hogi
jab ke zameen zal zale ke saath hila di jayegi
aur pahaad bilkul reza reza kar diye jayenge
phir wo misl para-gandha ghubaar ke ho jayenge
aur tum teen jamaato mein ho jaoge
pas daahne haath waale kaise acche hai, daahne haath waale
aur baay haath waale kya haal, baay haath waalo ka
aur jo aage waale hai, wo to aage waale hee hai
wo bilkul nazdiki haasil kiye hoye hai
nemato waali jannato mein hai
(bahuth bada) gruh agle logo mein se hoga
aur thode se pichle logo mein se
ye log sone ke taaro se bane hoye taqto par
ek dosre ke saamne takya lagaaye baithe honge
un ke paas aise ladke jo hamesha (ladke hee) rahenge, aamadh wa raft karenge
aab qoore aur jag le kar aur aisa jaam le kar jo behti hoyi sharaab se por ho
jis se na sar mein dard ho, na aql mein futoor aaye
aur aise mewe liye hoye, jo un ki pasandh ke ho
aur parindo ke gosht jo unhe marghoob ho
aur badi badi aankho waali hore
jo chupe hoye motiyo ki tarah hai
ye sila hai un ke amaal ka
na wahaa bakwaas sunenge, aur na gunaah ki baath
sirf salaam hee salaam ki awaaz hogi
aur daahne haath waale kya hee acche hai, daahne haath waale
wo baghair kaanto ki beriyo
aur tay ba tay kelo
aur lambe lambe saayo
aur behte hoye paaniyo
aur ba kasrath phalo mein
jo na qatam ho, na rok liye jaaye
aur oonche oonche farsho par honge
hum ne un (ki biwiyo ko) qaas taur par banaya hai
aur hum ne unhe kuwaariya bana diya hai
muhabbath waaliya aur hum umr hai
daaye haath waalo ke liye hai
jamme ghafeer hai, aglo mein se
aur bahuth badi jamaath hai pichlo mein se
aur baaye haath waale kya hai baaye haath waale
garam hawa aur garam paani mein honge
aur siyaah dhuye ke saaye mein
jo na thanda hai na farhath baqsh
beshak ye log is se pehle bahuth naazo mein pale hoye thein
aur bade bade gunaaho par israar karte thein
aur kehte thein ke kya jab hum mar jayenge aur mitthi aur haddi ho jayenge, to kya hum phir dobaara utha khade kiye jayenge
aur kya hamaare agle baap dada bhi
aap keh dijiye ke yaqinan sab agle aur pichle
zaroor jama kiya jayenge ek muqarrar din ke waqth
phir tum aye gumraaho jhutlaane waalo
albatta khaane waale ho, tuhar ka daraqth
aur osi se pet bharne waale ho
phir us par garam khaulta paani pine waale ho
phir pine waale bhi piyaase onto ki tarah
qayaamath ke din un ki mehmaani ye hai
hum hee ne tum sab ko payda kiya hai, phir tum kyo baawar nahi karte
accha phir ye to bath-laao ke jo mani tum tapkaate ho
kya us ka (insaan) tum banaate ho, ya payda karne waale hum hee hai
hum hee ne tum mein mauth ko mutayyan kar diya hai aur hum us se haare hoye nahi hai
ke tumhaari jageh tum jaise aur payda karde aur tumhe nay seere se us aalam mein payda kare, jis se tum bilkul be-qabar ho
tumhe yaqini taur par pehli dafah ki paydayish maloom hee hai, phir kyo ibrath haasil nahi karte
accha phir ye bhi batlaao ke, tum jo kuch bo’te ho
ose tum hee ugaate ho ya hum ugaane waale hai
agar hum chaahe to ose reza reza kar daale aur tum hayrath ke saath baatein banaate hee reh jaao
ke hum par to tawaan hee pad gaya
balke hum bilkul mehroom hee reh gaye
accha ye bataao ke jis paani ko tum pite ho
ose baadhlo se bhi tum hee utaarte ho ya hum barsaate hai
agar hamaari mansha ho, to hum ose kadwa zaher karde, phir tum hamaari shukr guzaari kyo nahi karte
accha zara ye bhi bataao ke jo aag tum sulgaate ho
us ke daraqth ko tum ne payda kiya hai, ya hum us ke payda karne waale hai
hum ne ose sabab nasihath aur musaafiro ke fayde ki cheez banaya hai
pas apne bahuth bade rab ke naam ki tasbih kiya karo
pas main qasam khaata hoon, sitaaro ke girne ki
aur agar tumhe ilm ho, to ye bahuth badi qasam hai
ke beshak ye Qur’aan bahuth badi izzath waala hai
jo ek mehfooz kitaab mein darj hai
jise sirf paak log hee cho sakte hai
ye rabbul aalameen ki taraf se utra hoa hai
pas kya tum aisi baath ko sar sari (aur mamoli) samajh rahe ho
aur apne hisse mein yahi lete ho ke, jhutlaate phiro
pas jab ke ruh nar qare tak pahonch jaaye
aur tum us waqt aankho se dekhte raho
hum us shaqs se ba-nisbath tumhaare bahuth zyaada qareeb hote hai, lekin tum nahi dekh sakte
pas agar tum kisi ke zere farmaan nahi
aur us qaul mein sacche ho, to (zara) us ruh ko to lautaao
pas jo koyi baar-gaahe ilaahi se qareeb kiya hoa hoga
ose to raahath hai aur ghizaaye hai aur araam waali jannath hai
aur jo shaqs daahne haath waalo mein se hai
to bhi salaamti hai tere liye, ke to daahne waalo mein se hai
lekin agar koyi jhutlaane waalo gumraaho mein se hai
to khaulte hoye garam paani ki mehmaani hai
aur dozakh mein jaana hai
ye qabar saraasar haq hai aur qat’an yaqini hai
pas tu apne azeemush shaan parvardigaar ki tasbih kar
asmaano aur zameen mein jo hai (sab) Allah ki tasbih kar rahe hai, wo zabardasth ba hikmath hai
asamaano aur zameen ki badshaahath osi ki hai, wahi zindagi deta hai aur mauth bhi aur wo har cheez par qaadir hai
wahi pehle hai aur wahi piche, wahi zaaher hai aur wahi maqfi aur wo har cheez ko ba qoobi jaanne waala hai

wahi hai jis ne asmaano aur zameen ko che din mein payda kiya, phir arsh par mustawi ho gaya, wo (qoob) jaanta hai us cheez ko jo zameen mein jaaye aur jo us se nikle aur jo asmaan se niche aaye aur jo kuch chad kar us mein jaaye aur jahaa kahi tum ho wo tumhaare saath hai aur jo tum kar rahe ho Allah dekh raha hai
asmaano ki aur zameen ki badshaahi osi ki hai aur tamaam kaam osi ki taraf lautaaye jaate hai
wahi raath ko din mein le jaata hai aur wahi din ko raath mein daakhil kar deta hai aur sino ke bhedo ka wo pura aalim hai

Allah par aur us ke rasool par imaan le aao aur us maal mein se qarch karo jis mein Allah ne tumhe (dosro ka) jaanasheen banaya hai, pas tum mein se jo imaan laaye aur khayraath kare unhe bahuth bada sawaab milega
tum Allah par imaan kyo nahi laate? halaan ke khud rasool tumhe apne rab par imaan laane ki daawath de raha hai aur agar tum momin ho to, wo to tum se mazbooth ehadh wa paymaan bhi le chuka hai
wo (Allah) hee hai jo apne bandhe par waazeh aayate utaarta hai, ta ke wo tumhe andhero se noor ki taraf le jaaye, yaqinan Allah ta’ala tum par narmi karne waala rahem karne waala hai

tumhe kya ho gaya hai jo tum Allah ki raah mein qarch nahi karte? dar asl asmaano aur zameeno ki miraas ka maalik (tanha) Allah hee hai, tum mein se jin logo ne fateh se pehle fi sabilillah diya hai aur qitaal kiya hai wo (dosro ke) baraabar nahi, balke un se bahuth bade darje ke hai, jinhone fateh ke baadh qairaate di aur jihaad kiye, haan bhalaayi ka waada to Allah ta’ala ka un sab se hai, jo kuch tum kar rahe ho, us se Allah qabardaar hai
kaun hai jo Allah ta’ala ko acchi tarah qarz de, phir Allah ta’ala us ke liye badaata chala jaaye aur us ke liye pasandida ajr saabith ho jaaye

(qayaamath ke) din tu dekhega ke momin mardo aur aurto ka noor un ke aage aage aur unke daaye daud raha hoga, aaj tumhe un jannato ki khush qabri hai, jin ke niche nehre jaari haim jin mein hamesha ki rehaayesh hai, ye hai badi kamyaabi

us din munaafiq mard wa aurath imaan waalo se kahenge ke hamaara intezaar to karo, ke hum bhi tumhaare noor se kuch roushni haasil karle, jawaab diya jayega ke tum apne piche laut jaao aur roushni talaash karo, phir un ke aur un ke darmiyaan ek diwaar haayel kardi jayegi, jis mein darwaaza bhi hoga, us ke androoni hisse mein to rehmath hogi aur baaher ki taraf azaab hoga

ye chilla chilla kar un se kahenge ke kya hum tumhaare saath na thein, wo kahenge ke haan thein to sahih, lekin tum ne apne aap ko fitne mein phasa rakha tha aur intezaar mein hee rahe aur shak wa shuba karte rahe aur tumhe tumhaari fuzool tamannaao ne dhuke mein hee rakha, yahaa tak ke Allah ka hukm aa pahoncha, aur tumhe Allah ke baare mein dhuka dene waale ne dhuke mein hee rakha
al gharz aaj tum se na fidya (aur na badhla) qubool kiya jayega aur na kaafiro se, (tum sab) ka thikaana dozakh hai, wahi tumhaari rafeeq hai aur wo bura thikaana hai

kya ab tak imaan waalo ke liye waqt nahi aaya, ke un ke dil zikre ilaahi se aur jo haq utar chuka hai us se narm ho jaaye aur un ki tarah na ho jaaye, jinhe un se pehle kitaab di gayi thi, phir jab un par ek zamaana daraaz guzar gaya to un ke dil saqt ho gaye aur un mein bahuth se faasiq hai
yaqeen maano ke Allah hee zameen ko us ki mauth ke baadh zinda kar deta hai, hum ne to tumhaare liye apni aayate bayaan kardi ta ke tum samjho
beshak sadqa dene waale mardh aur sadqa dene waali aurte aur jo Allah ko quloos ke saath qarz de rahe hai, un ke liye ye badaya jayega aur un ke liye pasandida ajr wa sawaab hai

Allah aur us ke rasool par jo imaan rakhte hai, wahi log apne rab ke nazdeek siddiq aur shaheed hai, un ke liye un ka ajr aur un ka noor hai aur jo log kufr karte hai aur hamaari aayato ko jhutlaate hai, wo jahannami hai

qoob jaan rakho ke dunya ki zindagi sirf khel tamaasha, zeenath aur aapas mein faqr (wa ghuroor) aur maal wa aulaad mein ek ka dosre se apne aap ko zyaada batlaana hai, jaise baarish aur us ki paydawaar kisaano ko acchi maloom hoti hai, phir jab wo khushk ho jaati hai to zard rang mein us ko tum dekhte ho, phir wo bilkul chura chura ho jaati hai aur aaqirath mein saqth azaab aur Allah ki maghfirath aur raza mandhi hai, aur dunya ki zindagi bajuz dhuke ke samaan ke aur kuch bhi to nahi

(aao) daudo apne rab ki maghfirath ki taraf aur us jannath ki taraf jis ki wus’ath asmaan wa zameen ki wus’ath ke baraabar hai, ye un ke liye banaayi gayi hai jo Allah par aur us ke rasulo par imaan rakhte hai, ye Allah ka fazl hai, jise chaahe de aur Allah bade fazl waala hai
na koyi musibath dunya mein aati hai na(qaas) tumhaari jaano mein, magar us se pehle ke hum us ko payda kare, wo ek qaas kitaab mein likhi hoyi hai, ye kaam Allah ta’ala par (bilkul) asaan hai
ta ke tum apne se fauth shuda kisi cheez par ranjida na ho jaya karo aur na ataa karda cheez par itra jaao aur itraane waale sheqi quro ko Allah ta’ala pasandh nahi farmaata
jo (khud bhi) buql kare aur dosro ko (bhi) buql ki taleem de, suno! jo bhi mu phere Allah be niyaaz aur sazawaar aur hamdh wa sana hai

yaqinan hum ne apne payghambaro ko khuli dalile de kar bheja aur un ke saath kitaab aur mizaan(taraazo) naazil farmaaya ta ke log adl par qaayam rahe aur hum ne lohe ko utaara jis mein saqth haybath wa quwwath hai aur logo ke liye aur bhi (bahuth se) fayde hai aur is liye bhi ke Allah jaan le ke us ki aur us ke rasulo ki madad be dekhe kaun karta hai, beshak Allah quwwath wala aur zabardasth hai

beshak hum ne Nuh(alaihissalaam) aur Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ko (paighambar bana kar) bheja aur hum ne un duno ki aulaad mein paighambari aur kitaab jaari rakhi, to un mein se kuch to raahe yaafta hoye aur un mein se aksar bahuth na farmaan rahe

un ke baadh phir hum apne rasulo ko pay dar pay bhejte rahe aur un ke baadh Isa bin maryam(alaihissalaam) ko bheja aur unhe injeel ata farmaayi aur un ke maanne waalo ke dilo mein shafaqqath aur rahem payda kar diya, haan ruhbaaniyath (tarke dunya) to un logo ne az khud ejaadh karli thi, hum ne un par ose waajib na kiya tha, siwaye Allah ki raza joyi ke, so unhone us ki puri ria’yath na ki, phir bhi hum ne un mein se jo imaan laaye thein, unhe un ka ajr diya aur un mein zyaada tar log na farmaan hai

aye wo logo jo imaan laaye ho! Allah se darte raha karo aur us ke rasool par imaan laao, Allah tumhe apni rahmath ka dohra hissa dega aur tumhe noor dega, jis ki roushni mein tum chalo phiroge aur tumhaare gunaah bhi maaf farma dega, Allah baqshne waala meherbaan hai
ye is liye ke ahle kitaab jaan le ke Allah ke fazl ke kisi hisse par bhi unhe eqtiyaar nahi aur ye ke (saara) fazl Allah hee ke haath hai, wo jise chaahe de aur Allah hai hee bade fazl waala
